response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us, reflecting its unique features, durability, and the expertise that went into its creation. Given its high value and rarity, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. For this opportunity, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10,000. I am confident that you will find the product to exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 10000}
